items.title: Awesome Jmeter

items.title: Awesome Vulkan
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   Low Level
    *   [Vulkan Memory Allocator (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/VulkanMemoryAllocator) - Easy to integrate Vulkan memory allocation library from AMD. \[MIT]
        *   \[VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp] ([https://github.com/malte-v/VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/malte-v/VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp)) - C++ Bindings for VMA, like Vulkan-HPP
    *   [Fossilize (‚≠ê35)](https://github.com/Themaister/Fossilize) - serialization format for various persistent Vulkan object types. \[MIT]
    *   [vk-bootstrap (‚≠ê989)](https://github.com/charles-lunarg/vk-bootstrap) - C++ utility library to jump start Vulkan development by automating instance, physical device, device, and swapchain creation. \[MIT]
    *   [Google's vulkan-cpp-library (‚≠ê250)](https://github.com/google/vulkan-cpp-library) - Vulkan abstraction library using C++11 for memory, resource management, type and thread safety as well as system independency. \[Apache]
    *   [FrameGraph (‚≠ê419)](https://github.com/azhirnov/FrameGraph) - Vulkan abstraction layer that represent frame as a task graph. \[BSD 2-clause]
    *   [V-EZ (‚≠ê876)](https://github.com/GPUOpen-LibrariesAndSDKs/V-EZ) - light-weight middleware layer for the Vulkan API targeting Professional Workstation ISVs. \[MIT]
    *   [Vookoo (‚≠ê533)](https://github.com/andy-thomason/Vookoo) - Vookoo is a set of dependency-free utilities to assist in the construction and updating of Vulkan graphics data structres. \[MIT]
    *   [vpp (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/nyorain/vpp) - Modern C++ Vulkan Abstraction focused on performance and a straightforward interface. \[MIT]
    *   [VulkanSceneGraph](https://github.com/vsg-dev) - Vulkan/C++17 scene graph project, successor to [OpenSceneGraph](http://www.openscenegraph.org).
    *   [Vulkan-WSIWindow (‚≠ê109)](https://github.com/renelindsay/Vulkan-WSIWindow) - Multi-platform library to create a Vulkan window, and handle input events. \[Apache License 2.0]
    *   [Screen 13 (‚≠ê311)](https://github.com/attackgoat/screen-13) - An easy-to-use Vulkan render graph for Rust. \[MIT]
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • Low Level
    • Vulkan Memory Allocator (‚≠ê2.9k) - Easy to integrate Vulkan memory allocation library from AMD. [MIT]
      • [VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp] (https://github.com/malte-v/VulkanMemoryAllocator-Hpp (‚≠ê37)) - C++ Bindings for VMA, like Vulkan-HPP
    • Fossilize (‚≠ê35) - serialization format for various persistent Vulkan object types. [MIT]
    • vk-bootstrap (‚≠ê989) - C++ utility library to jump start Vulkan development by automating instance, physical device, device, and swapchain creation. [MIT]
    • Google's vulkan-cpp-library (‚≠ê250) - Vulkan abstraction library using C++11 for memory, resource management, type and thread safety as well as system independency. [Apache]
    • FrameGraph (‚≠ê419) - Vulkan abstraction layer that represent frame as a task graph. [BSD 2-clause]
    • V-EZ (‚≠ê876) - light-weight middleware layer for the Vulkan API targeting Professional Workstation ISVs. [MIT]
    • Vookoo (‚≠ê533) - Vookoo is a set of dependency-free utilities to assist in the construction and updating of Vulkan graphics data structres. [MIT]
    • vpp (‚≠ê263) - Modern C++ Vulkan Abstraction focused on performance and a straightforward interface. [MIT]
    • VulkanSceneGraph - Vulkan/C++17 scene graph project, successor to OpenSceneGraph.
    • Vulkan-WSIWindow (‚≠ê109) - Multi-platform library to create a Vulkan window, and handle input events. [Apache License 2.0]
    • Screen 13 (‚≠ê311) - An easy-to-use Vulkan render graph for Rust. [MIT]

items.title: Awesome Db Tools
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [DB Lens (‚≠ê261)](https://github.com/dblens/app) - Open Source Postgres GUI - Automatic ER diagrams, Internal DB Insights, Disk Utilisation, Performance Metrics, Index Usage, Sequential scan counts and more.

### Schema / Design

*   [DbSchema](https://dbschema.com/) - Universal database designer for out-of-the-box schema management, schema documentation, design in a team, and deployment on multiple databases. DbSchema features tools for writing and executing queries, exploring the data, generating data, and building reports.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • DB Lens (‚≠ê261) - Open Source Postgres GUI - Automatic ER diagrams, Internal DB Insights, Disk Utilisation, Performance Metrics, Index Usage, Sequential scan counts and more.

Schema / Design

  • DbSchema - Universal database designer for out-of-the-box schema management, schema documentation, design in a team, and deployment on multiple databases. DbSchema features tools for writing and executing queries, exploring the data, generating data, and building reports.

items.title: Awesome Home Assistant
items.content_text:
### Installing

*   [Home Assistant Installation](https://www.home-assistant.io/installation/) - The official installation guides.
*   [Compare Installation Methods](https://www.home-assistant.io/installation/#compare-installation-methods) - The available installation methods compared.

### Public Configurations / Other Communities

*   [Klaas Schoute (‚≠ê220)](https://github.com/klaasnicolaas/Student-homeassistant-config) - Hass.io based, Intel NUC, Ubuntu Server, Docker and regularly updated.

### Add-ons / Third Party Add-ons

*   [EmonCMS (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/inverse/hassio-addon-emoncms) - A powerful open-source web app for processing, logging, and visualizing energy, temperature, and other environmental data.

### Dashboards / Third Party Add-ons

*   [Dashboards Documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/dashboards/) - The official documentation.

### Dashboards / Custom Cards

*   [Card Modder (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/thomasloven/lovelace-card-mod) - Style your Lovelace cards.
*   [Atomic Calendar Revive (‚≠ê526)](https://github.com/totaldebug/atomic-calendar-revive) - Calendar card with advanced settings.
*   [Vacuum Map Card (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/PiotrMachowski/Home-Assistant-Lovelace-Xiaomi-Vacuum-Map-card) - This card provides a user-friendly way to fully control Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Dreame/Roidmi) and Neato (+ possibly other) vacuums.
*   [Raspberry Pi Status Card (‚≠ê216)](https://github.com/ironsheep/lovelace-rpi-monitor-card) - Show status of your Raspberry Pis.

### Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

*   [HACS](https://hacs.xyz/) - This is a manager for your custom integration (components) and plugin (lovelace elements) needs.
*   [Xiaomi Cloud Map Extractor (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/PiotrMachowski/Home-Assistant-custom-components-Xiaomi-Cloud-Map-Extractor) - Presents a live view of a map for Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Roidmi/Dreame) vacuums without a need for rooting.

### DIY / Alternative Dashboards

*   [Tasmota (‚≠ê23k)](https://github.com/arendst/Tasmota) - Firmware for ESP8266 boards and devices.

### Online Resources / YouTube Channels

*   [Home Assistant](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbX3YkedQunLt7EQAdVxh7w) - Official YouTube Channel where new launches and live streams are held.
*   [Everything Smart Home](https://www.youtube.com/c/EverythingSmartHome) - Focuses on Smart Home, Home Automation, general tech reviews, guides, and step-by-step DIY projects.

### Other Awesome Lists / Twitter

*   [awesome-selfhosted (‚≠ê236k)](https://github.com/awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted) - Curated list of awesome self hosted software.
items.content_html:
Installing

  • Home Assistant Installation - The official installation guides.
  • Compare Installation Methods - The available installation methods compared.

Public Configurations / Other Communities

  • Klaas Schoute (‚≠ê220) - Hass.io based, Intel NUC, Ubuntu Server, Docker and regularly updated.

Add-ons / Third Party Add-ons

  • EmonCMS (‚≠ê14) - A powerful open-source web app for processing, logging, and visualizing energy, temperature, and other environmental data.

Dashboards / Third Party Add-ons

  • Dashboards Documentation - The official documentation.

Dashboards / Custom Cards

  • Card Modder (‚≠ê1.4k) - Style your Lovelace cards.
  • Atomic Calendar Revive (‚≠ê526) - Calendar card with advanced settings.
  • Vacuum Map Card (‚≠ê1.7k) - This card provides a user-friendly way to fully control Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Dreame/Roidmi) and Neato (+ possibly other) vacuums.
  • Raspberry Pi Status Card (‚≠ê216) - Show status of your Raspberry Pis.

Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

  • HACS - This is a manager for your custom integration (components) and plugin (lovelace elements) needs.
  • Xiaomi Cloud Map Extractor (‚≠ê1.3k) - Presents a live view of a map for Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Roidmi/Dreame) vacuums without a need for rooting.

DIY / Alternative Dashboards

  • Tasmota (‚≠ê23k) - Firmware for ESP8266 boards and devices.

Online Resources / YouTube Channels

  • Home Assistant - Official YouTube Channel where new launches and live streams are held.
  • Everything Smart Home - Focuses on Smart Home, Home Automation, general tech reviews, guides, and step-by-step DIY projects.

Other Awesome Lists / Twitter

  • awesome-selfhosted (‚≠ê236k) - Curated list of awesome self hosted software.
